Banking House of Macarthur & Knowles, established in Prince Albert, N.W.T., offers a wide range of banking services. Located in the heart of downtown, our bank provides convenient access to your finances.

ROYAL CANADIAN COMMISSARY BENNETT'S PHARMACY.

COMMUNICATIONS.

Oh—In your last issue I was pleased to learn that the government planned to send a telegraphist alongside Mr. Knowles in his position as Cambrian Mine Manager on Cap Corey. However, I am concerned that the telegraphist's role will remain purely administrative and not extend into the fieldwork required for mine exploration. Despite the initial enthusiasm shown by Mr. Knowles' appointment, the lack of tangible progress in mining activities thus far has raised doubts among shareholders regarding the feasibility of such a project.

DEVELOPMENT AND Paperhanging a Specialty.
Hudson Bay Route.

The Country and Climate Along the Hudson Bay Route. Extracts from a Lecture by Arthur Nelson.

Starting from Winnipeg and going northward along the route explored by Nelson to the Grand Rapids, the region traversed through is such that the expense of building a railway would be very high. It is a very level country with plains, swamps, lakes, and streams. There is no rock in this country on the surface, but there are many hills and mountains, and forests abound. These scenes are so vast and beautiful that they will be remembered by all who visit them.

The "Dog House" is a valuable stopping place on the railway. Beyond this point the country becomes more mountainous, and there is a range of mountains to the west. There is also a river of any size to cross, and this can be easily done by boat or by horse. The route goes through the forest, and there are many trees to cut down. The trees are very tall and strong, and the wood is very hard and heavy. The climate is very cold, and the snow falls heavily. The people who live here are very hardworking and industrious.

HUDSON'S BAY CO'Y

FARMING LANDS!

FOR SALE IN

Manitoba & North-west

The Hudson's Bay Company own 7,500,000 acres in the Great Fertile Belt, and now offer for sale 500,000 acres, already surveyed by the Government of Canada.

TOWN LOTS FOR SALE

In Winnipeg, West Lynne, Rat Portage, Portage la Prairie and Goshen, N.W.T.

The above lots will be disposed of at reasonable prices and on easy terms of payment. Full information in regard to these lands will be given at the offices of the Company in Winnipeg and Montreal.

JACKSON & JACKSON
